title: Sizzling turkey and orange salad
ingredients: ['500 g (1 lb 2 oz) skinned and boned turkey', '1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '4 spring onions, sliced', 'Salt and black pepper', 'A bunch of watercress, thick stalks removed', 'For the marinade', '2 large oranges', '2 teaspoons honey', '2 teaspoons wholegrain mustard', '1 shallot, finely chopped']
